raw_content.title: RRB Group D Recruitment 2026 - 5000+ Vacancies
raw_content.description: Railway Recruitment Board has released notification for Group D posts. Candidates who have passed 10th class from recognized board can apply. Age should be between 18-33 years. Salary will be Rs 18000-25000 per month. Last date to apply is 15-03-2026. Apply online at official website.

rewritten_content.title: रेलवे ग्रुप डी भर्ती 2026 - 5000+ पद
rewritten_content.title_en: Railway Group D Jobs 2026 - Apply for 5000+ Posts
rewritten_content.description: भारतीय रेलवे ने ग्रुप डी पदों के लिए भर्ती निकाली है। 10वीं पास युवाओं के लिए सुनहरा मौका। अभी आवेदन करें।
rewritten_content.description_en: Indian Railways invites applications for Group D posts. Golden opportunity for 10th pass candidates. Apply now before the deadline.

raw_content.title: Ayushman Bharat PM-JAY Scheme
raw_content.description: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana is a health insurance scheme providing Rs 5 lakh coverage per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization. It covers poor and vulnerable families as per SECC database. Treatment available at empanelled hospitals.

rewritten_content.title: आयुष्मान भारत योजना - ₹5 लाख मुफ्त इलाज
rewritten_content.title_en: Ayushman Bharat - Free Treatment up to ₹5 Lakh
rewritten_content.description: प्रधानमंत्री जन आरोग्य योजना के तहत गरीब परिवारों को ₹5 लाख तक का मुफ्त इलाज मिलता है। अस्पताल में भर्ती होने पर कोई खर्च नहीं।
rewritten_content.description_en: Get free medical treatment up to ₹5 lakh per year under PM Jan Arogya Yojana. Covers all hospitalization expenses for eligible families.
highlights: सरकारी और प्राइवेट अस्पतालों में मान्य

raw_content.title: SSC CHSL 2026 Notification Released
raw_content.description: Staff Selection Commission has released notification for Combined Higher Secondary Level examination. Posts include LDC, JSA, PA, DEO. Candidates with 12th pass qualification can apply. Age limit 18-27 years with relaxation for reserved categories. Salary range Rs 25000-35000. Online application starts from 01-02-2026.

rewritten_content.title: SSC CHSL 2026 - 12वीं पास के लिए सरकारी नौकरी
rewritten_content.title_en: SSC CHSL 2026 - Govt Jobs for 12th Pass
rewritten_content.description: स्टाफ सिलेक्शन कमीशन ने CHSL परीक्षा का नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया। LDC, JSA, PA, DEO पदों पर भर्ती। 12वीं पास अभी आवेदन करें।
rewritten_content.description_en: SSC has released CHSL notification for LDC, JSA, PA, DEO posts. 12th pass candidates eligible. Apply now for government jobs.

raw_content.title: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana
raw_content.description: PM Kisan is a central sector scheme providing income support of Rs 6000 per year to all landholding farmer families. Amount is transferred in 3 equal installments of Rs 2000 directly to bank account through DBT. Small and marginal farmers with cultivable land are eligible.

rewritten_content.title: PM किसान सम्मान निधि - ₹6000 सालाना
rewritten_content.description: किसानों को सीधे बैंक खाते में ₹6000 सालाना मिलते हैं। तीन किस्तों में ₹2000-2000 आते हैं। खेती करने वाले सभी किसान पात्र।
rewritten_content.description_en: Farmers receive ₹6000 annually directly in bank account. Amount comes in 3 installments of ₹2000 each. All cultivating farmers eligible.

raw_content.title: Bihar Police Constable Recruitment 2026
raw_content.description: Bihar Central Selection Board of Constable has announced recruitment for Constable posts. 8000 vacancies available. Candidates should have passed 12th from recognized board. Age should be 18-25 years as on 01-01-2026. Physical test will be conducted. Apply online before 01-04-2026.

rewritten_content.title: बिहार पुलिस कांस्टेबल भर्ती 2026 - 8000 पद
rewritten_content.description: बिहार पुलिस में कांस्टेबल के 8000 पदों पर भर्ती। 12वीं पास युवा आवेदन करें। फिजिकल टेस्ट होगा। बिहार के निवासी अभी अप्लाई करें।
rewritten_content.description_en: Bihar Police recruiting 8000 Constables. 12th pass candidates from Bihar can apply. Physical test mandatory. Apply before deadline.
